goal: We develop and sell expertise, knowledge and software for clinical skills assessments for Schools of medicine, Nursing & Health Science as well as for dentistry and veterinary medicine. Keywords: OSCE; Clinical Skills; Entrustable Professional Activities; e-Portfolio
